description.content: Primarily supported action is dry-run, which returns objects and resources that are updated if failover is triggered. WARNING: Do not use the execute action, it is for use by BIG-IP only.

F5 Cloud Failover (CFE) is an iControl LX Extension delivered as a TMOS-independent RPM file. Installing the CFE Extension on BIG-IP enables you to declaratively configure BIG-IP devices for automatic failover in cloud environments by POSTing a single JSON declaration to CFs declarative REST API endpoint.
